definition: reduced in strength, to become weaker, in strength, value, or magnitude
details:
adjective
- reduced in strength
= synonyms: faded
verb
- to become weaker, in strength, value, or magnitude
= example: to become weaker, in strength, value, or magnitude
- to weaken the consistency of a chemical substance
= example: to weaken the consistency of a chemical substance
= synonyms: rarefy
